name: The Forgotten Kingdom of Wasteland
startIntroPart1: How lucky we are to be spared from this disaster that happened upon us. Little to none problems, safe place and many great people are around us. Using our strenght, removing any weaknesses, utilizing anything we can a, kingdom was born. Kingdom which in, laws and order were made. Place with working and healthy to an extend society. But I have something to say. Today...  Today is the last day of our isolation. Now, without fear and prejudice we stand in front of a new world. Birthed by forces of the past and the future... As a King I'm obligated to serve my people and my kingdom until death takes me away.
startIntroPart2: I don't know how many bridges we will build, burn and replace. But I know one most improtant thing, whatever lies before our next step. We will overcome it no matter what. We shall show ourselfs to the world.
declaringWar: I really dislike this option but I won't be sorry. Now, perish.
attacked: What a cruel thing to do. Nothing more to show? To say? Let my people show what are they capable of.
defeated: We have fallen...? But man like me is not made for defeat, my people strong and resilient... Please... Don't be so rough on them. H-How could have this came to be?!
denounced: Huh? I think the winds today are little... Noisy
declaringFriendship: And from now our people shall celebrate this freindship! C'mon grab a drink!
introduction: Welcome, welcome to my dearest Kingdom. Take a seat with me and don't worry about my citizens, come on we don't bite... We just like to watch outsiders out of curiosity and interest.
neutralHello: What do you want to say?
hateHello: You are a blister to this world. A Scar that should be left alone!
tradeRequest: Wouldn't you like to marry a daughter or son of mine?
uniques: Comment [+20% [Production] when constructing National Wonders and World Wonders]
[+20]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in all cities] <hidden from users>
+1 Culture, +1 Faith from every Natural Wonder
[+1 Happiness, +1 Culture, +1 Faith, +1 Science, +1 Gold] for every known Natural Wonder
Comment [Congress and Council buildings are replaced with Royal Advisors]

name: New Eden's Gate
declaringWar: If you are not willing to beg forgiveness so be it.
defeated: Like those who tried to stop us before, You too shall be banished from Garden of Eden!
introduction: May the God bless you like he did to us! We're the last lastion of old faith and its by God given image.
neutralHello: Make your confession to me, my friend.
hateHello: Remember even now, God still loves you.
uniques: [+15]% Strength <within [1] tiles of a [City center]> <after enhancing a religion>
Gain a free [Follower] belief <upon adopting [Theocracy Complete]>

name: Vultures
startIntroPart1: What a sad day. Just looking at what has become of our planet. The thought of many mistakes that led to this disaster. We could forsee it. But THEY didn't. THEY HAD to do it on purpose. 'Why?' someone may ask. I'ill tell 'why'. THEY did it to create new world where THEY are the leaders. THEY wanted to control everyone, everything and the progression of what could be after this cleansing of humanity.
startIntroPart2: But THEY fucked up badly. That's the funny part and here the punch-line. We will overtake them!
declaringWar: *Radio Static* This is pre-recorded message from your saviours. Please do not respond. 'Consider yourserlf under new management. *Radio Static*
attacked: R-really? You maim the last place of human progress? How wasteful of you.
defeated: Now everthing we did is going to waste. Farewell sub-human. Do your worst.
denounced: Your words are no match against our knowledge.
declaringFriendship: Your're worthy so lets go reach the stars.
introduction: Oh hello. I'm Andrey Canbs, Leader of new world saviours. So what is your purpose here in this barren wasteland?
uniqueName: Nothing Left To Restore, Only To Use
uniques: May buy items in puppet cities

name: All-in-One Company
startIntroPart1: Would ya' look at that. All of our previous competitors are either gone or severly weakened.
startIntroPart2: Hurry! Don't waste my time or I will decrease your pay. Shoo~!
declaringWar: Your sectors are of great quality, but they are poorly managed. Now our interest is to take them.
attacked: What's that work ethic? I don't think this will make any profit for anyone.
defeated: Now, you are the new CEO. I'm retiring. Permamently
declaringFriendship: Seeing your management skills may I ask you. Want to cooperate?
introduction: *Everything you want. Evertyhing you need. We will grant it. Just like we agreed.* Now tell me how do you like our new commercial jingle? Is it catchy and annoying enough?.
uniques: [+50]% Culture cost of natural border growth [in all cities]

name: The Sounds
attacked: Sounds of your despair will be heard for long time.
